creator: pasuladi@rediffmail.com
text:
I am novice using VSS which is installed on a server which I am accessing 
through VSS client over my local machine.
My Ant 1.5 version build script contains a vssget task which is failing due to 
IOException. Kindly advice how to specify the various paths for the attributes 
in my scenario.

creator: ddevienne@lgc.com
text: Just make sure ss.exe, the VSS client, is in your PATH prior to run Ant.
Not enough information though Dominique reply solves the more evident problem.
creator: sbailliez@apache.org
